definition: The term refers to the process or act of connecting various elements, entities, or systems together in a networked or interconnected manner. It commonly describes the establishment of links, relationships, or associations between different components, often with the aim of enhancing communication, collaboration, or information exchange. This concept is frequently employed in the context of technology, communication networks, social systems, or organizational structures.

examples.german: Die Vernetzung der Computer ermöglicht den schnellen Datenaustausch.
examples.english: The networking of computers enables fast data exchange.

examples.german: Die Vernetzung von Unternehmen kann zu einer effizienteren Zusammenarbeit führen.
examples.english: The networking of companies can lead to more efficient collaboration.

examples.german: Die Vernetzung der verschiedenen Verkehrsmittel verbessert die Mobilität in der Stadt.
examples.english: The networking of different modes of transportation improves mobility in the city.

examples.german: Die Vernetzung der Sensoren ermöglicht eine automatische Steuerung des Systems.
examples.english: The networking of sensors enables automatic control of the system.

examples.german: Die Vernetzung der sozialen Medien hat zu einer globalen Kommunikation geführt.
examples.english: The networking of social media has led to global communication.
